<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Steel Yourself!](/Feats.aspx?ID=2009) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 180 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Marshal](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=66)

**Prerequisites**
[Marshal Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2005)

</column>

---

You encourage an ally to toughen up, giving them a fighting chance. Choose one ally within your marshal's aura. The ally gains temporary Hit Points equal to your Charisma modifier and a +2 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves. Both benefits last until the start of your next turn.
name: Steel Yourself!
